prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with a large flower on its back and a sturdy body.
Imagine a Pokemon that can thrive in both forests and urban areas, showcasing vibrant colors.
Generate a creature that resembles a giant frog with plant features and a cheerful personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique combination of blue and green colors, exuding a calm vibe.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller plant creature into a large, flower-covered beast.
Give me a Pokemon with a quadruped body shape that loves to bask in the sunlight.
Make a mythical creature that embodies the spirit of nature, with a friendly disposition.
